nodes.text: Astrology was the belief that the movements of planets and the positions of stars could influence someone's personality and future. Astrological systems were developed on many worlds, including Coruscant and Shili. By the Imperial Era, most people dismissed it as superstition. The Gatalentan Apprentice Legislator Amilyn Holdo believed in astrology, and liked to study and compare systems from various planets.
